translation:
Most Illustrious Sir  
Piratini, September 4, 1838.

Having the Government finally established a newspaper with the purpose of guiding the brave people of Rio Grande regarding the progress of affairs that concern them, by the insertion of the proceedings of the State Secretariats and official correspondence with the Generals, Commanders of the Republican Army Forces and Police, and being unable, considering the repeated shortages of the army, to distribute the said newspaper free of charge, it entrusts Your Lordship

The names of the subscribers will be sent to Luís Rossetti, editor of the said newspaper.

God keep Your Lordship  
Domingos José de Almeida

Dispatch of the Most Excellent  
September 4, received on the 10th of the same month, regarding the periodical.
